DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , open-label , dose-exploration dose-expansion study evaluate safety , tolerability , antitumor activity , PK , pharmacodynamics , immunogenicity MEDI4736 combination tremelimumab subject recurrent/metastatic squamous cell carcinoma head neck .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Study Evaluate Safety , Tolerability Efficacy MEDI4736 ( Durvalumab ) With Tremelimumab Head Neck Cancer
